alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 04 at 10:46AM CDT until June 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau affecting Perry, Jackson, Cape Girardeau, Union, Scott and Alexander Counties. .The river level is rising and is expected to crest right at flood stage at Cape Girardeau. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs. The Mississippi River backs into several creeks producing flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 32.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
